eu.smartdatalake.simsearch.measure

Interface ISimilarity<V>

  • Type Parameters:
    V - Type variable to represent the values involved in the similarity calculations (usually, double values).
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DecayedSimilarity, MetricSimilarity

    public interface ISimilarity<V>
    Interface to various similarity measures

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double calc(V v)
      Calculates similarity scores against a fixed query value according to different measures (e.g., Jaccard, exponential decay).
      double calc(V v1, V v2)
      Calculates similarity scores between two values according to different measures (e.g., Jaccard, exponential decay).
      IDistance<V> getDistanceMeasure()
      Provides a handle to the distance measure applied: Jaccard for categorical search; numerical difference for numbers; Haversine for spatial locations.
      int getTaskId()
      Provides the serial number of the task (thread) involved in the similarity search.
      boolean isScaleSet()
      Indicates whether the scaling factor has been set in order to report similarity scores.
      double scoring(double distance)
      Provides the similarity score that corresponds to the given distance value.

    • Method Detail

      • calc

        double calc(V v)
        Calculates similarity scores against a fixed query value according to different measures (e.g., Jaccard, exponential decay). The data types of the compared values must be the same or comparable.
        Parameters:
        v - The data value to compare with a fixed query value.
        Returns:
        Estimated similarity score in [0..1].

      • calc

        double calc(V v1,
            V v2)
        Calculates similarity scores between two values according to different measures (e.g., Jaccard, exponential decay). The data types of the compared values must be the same or comparable.
        Parameters:
        v1 - The first value.
        v2 - The second value.
        Returns:
        Estimated similarity score in [0..1].

      • scoring

        double scoring(double distance)
        Provides the similarity score that corresponds to the given distance value.
        Parameters:
        distance - A numeric value representing the distance of the resulting item from the query value.
        Returns:
        A similarity score in [0..1].

      • getDistanceMeasure

        IDistance<V> getDistanceMeasure()
        Provides a handle to the distance measure applied: Jaccard for categorical search; numerical difference for numbers; Haversine for spatial locations.
        Returns:
        An instantiation of the distance measure

      • isScaleSet

        boolean isScaleSet()
        Indicates whether the scaling factor has been set in order to report similarity scores.
        Returns:
        True, if the scale factor is set (i.e., a value above 0); otherwise, False.

      • getTaskId

        int getTaskId()
        Provides the serial number of the task (thread) involved in the similarity search.
        Returns:
        An integer value that is used to identify the thread.
